io.micronaut.pulsar.annotation

Annotation Type PulsarReader


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={PARAMETER,FIELD})
public @interface PulsarReader
    Create and inject Pulsar reader into field.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Haris Secic

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String readerName 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      MessageSchema schema
      Defaults to MessageSchema.BYTES as default value for Pulsar Schema is byte[].
      boolean startMessageLatest 
      boolean subscribeAsync
      By default reader should subscribe in non-blocking manner using default CompletableFuture of ConsumerBuilder.subscribeAsync().
      @Pattern(regexp="((non-)?persistent://)?(\\w+(-?\\w+)?/){2}(\\w+(-?\\w+)?)") java.lang.String topic
      Only single topic subscription possible for readers.
      java.lang.String value 

    • Element Detail

      • readerName

        public abstract java.lang.String readerName
        Returns:
        Consumer name.

      • value

        @AliasFor(member="topic") @AliasFor(annotation=io.micronaut.messaging.annotation.MessageMapping.class,member="value")
public abstract java.lang.String value
        Returns:
        topic name to listen to
        See Also:
        topic()
        Default:
        ""

      • topic

        @AliasFor(member="value") @AliasFor(annotation=io.micronaut.messaging.annotation.MessageMapping.class,member="value")
 @Pattern(regexp="((non-)?persistent://)?(\\w+(-?\\w+)?/){2}(\\w+(-?\\w+)?)")
public abstract @Pattern(regexp="((non-)?persistent://)?(\\w+(-?\\w+)?/){2}(\\w+(-?\\w+)?)") java.lang.String topic
        Only single topic subscription possible for readers.
        Returns:
        topic name to listen to
        Default:
        ""

      • schema

        public abstract MessageSchema schema
        Defaults to MessageSchema.BYTES as default value for Pulsar Schema is byte[].
        Returns:
        Schema to use with pulsar topic consumer
        Default:
        io.micronaut.pulsar.MessageSchema.BYTES

      • subscribeAsync

        public abstract boolean subscribeAsync
        By default reader should subscribe in non-blocking manner using default CompletableFuture of ConsumerBuilder.subscribeAsync().

        If blocking set to false application will block until consumer is successfully subscribed

        Returns:
        Should the consumer subscribe in async manner or blocking
        Default:
        true

      • startMessageLatest

        public abstract boolean startMessageLatest
        Returns:
        Whether to position reader to newest available message in queue or not.
        Default:
        true
